casebody.data:
APOLLO REALTY INVESTMENTS, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; Platte River Insurance Company, a Nebraska corporation; Merzo, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; and K&L Baxter Family Limited Partnership, a Nevada limited partnership, Appellants,
v.
Zolt SZORENYI, an individual; Mercedes Tam Szorenyi, an individual; Rex, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; HAZ2011, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; Rezolt Homes Elite, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; and Zomer, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company, d/b/a Minions Construction, Respondents. No. 73705 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 17, 2018

Dismissed.
